name: Sun Catcher
description:
This game was made as a challenge: Build a game in a lunch break (60 minutes)

Its not that greate but it has been finished in under 60 minutes.

You are a cursor that must catch the sun. Use the arrow keys to navigate. Hover over the sun and press "c" to catch! The new sund will then appear by random!

Goal is to not click into the void, because that resets the score to 0 :)
